alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:20PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oglala Lakota and west central Bennett Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 120 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Batesland, or 21 miles east of Pine Ridge, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Batesland around 130 PM MDT. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
